translation.en: [Dib] I used to look up at space
translation.zh: 我曾经向虚空投视…

translation.en: with hope and wonder in my eyes.
translation.zh: 带着满眼的希望… 和惊奇…

translation.en: Until space looked back.
translation.zh: 直到虚空回以凝视

translation.en: Invader Zim,
translation.zh: 入侵者邪慕

translation.en: evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
translation.zh: 是怒星帝国的邪恶外星战士

translation.en: sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
translation.zh: 由恶魔主人最高陛下派遣

translation.en: to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
translation.zh: 渗透地球 为即将来临的入侵做准备

translation.en: Disguised as one of us,
translation.zh: 他伪装成我们的一员

translation.en: he moved into my neighborhood,
translation.zh: 住进我们的社区

translation.en: he went to my school,
translation.zh: 他去了我的学校

translation.en: and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
translation.zh: 和他可耻的机器仆人一起

translation.en: plotted to destroy everything we have,
translation.zh: 谋划摧毁我们拥有的一切

translation.en: -everything we are. -[helicopter whirring]
translation.zh: 摧毁我们

translation.en: -[crowd shouting] -And then...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: he vanished.
translation.zh: 他消失了

translation.en: My name is Dib Membrane.
translation.zh: 在下迪本膜尔

translation.en: I'm 12 years old.
And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.zh: 邪慕和世界毁灭之间 只有我这一道防线

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child-bellies
translation.zh: 准备好你幼小的辘辘饥肠

translation.en: for the awesome eventuality of dinner!
translation.zh: 享受可能会令人食指大动的晚餐吧！

translation.en: Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
translation.zh: 厨星3000希望您爱我的菜肴

translation.en: Also, what is love?
translation.zh: 还有 爱是什么？

translation.en: Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
translation.zh: 看着很棒啊 爸爸 我要吃

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Hold up now, daughter!
translation.zh: 慢着 女儿

translation.en: Isn't it time your brother joined us?
translation.zh: 是时候让你兄弟加入咱们吧？

translation.en: Oh, man, no.
translation.zh: 别提了

translation.en: Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.zh: 邪慕消失后 迪本在他的房间待了一百万年了

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
translation.zh: 我都认不出他了

translation.en: He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.zh: 他就坐在那把椅子上 越来越邋遢

translation.en: smellier.
translation.zh: 越来越臭…

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
translation.zh: 确实如此 但尽量多给一点理解

translation.en: Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
translation.zh: 迪本终于放弃愚蠢地痴迷

translation.en: with aliens and ghosts and all his other non-scientific nonsense.
translation.zh: 外星人、鬼魂和其它不科学的瞎想

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
translation.zh: 对他来说挺不容易的

translation.en: Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.zh: 能想象你不再相信电子游戏吗？

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
translation.zh: 少拿这事开玩笑 爸爸

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.zh: 宝贝 放下愚蠢的想法 就是成长的一部分

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.zh: 为何呢？因为我小的时候 以为鲨鱼是我的朋友

translation.en: [in ominous voice] I know better now.
translation.zh: 我现在学聪明了

translation.en: [in normal voice] So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.zh: 所以尽量多给点支持 他毕竟是你兄弟

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
translation.zh: 好吧 爸爸

translation.en: Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.zh: 嘿 迪本！爸爸说来吃饭啦！

translation.en: [Dib] You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.zh: 你知道 我不能离开岗位 贾斯

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
translation.zh: 把吃的推到这来就好

translation.en: Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.zh: 推菜的棍子在哪？ 没有棍子我没法推啊

translation.en: [Dib] Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.zh: 邪慕还在逍遥法外 贾斯 所以我得等着…

translation.en: and watch.
translation.zh: 盯着

translation.en: No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.zh: 别人都不会这样做 他们永远看不到真相 但是为什么呢？

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.zh: 他们永远看不到真相 但是为什么呢？ 洗脑？思想控制？

translation.en: Mind control?
translation.zh: 洗脑？思想控制？

translation.en: [whispering] Brain-erasing ghosts?
translation.zh: 抹除记忆的鬼？

translation.en: Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.zh: 现在没人相信我 但我会让他们看见

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.zh: 我会将他公之于众 让人类看到

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他们一直身处的险境

translation.en: Even Dad, world-famous man of science will say,
translation.zh: 即便父亲 世界著名的科学家都会说

translation.en: [in strange accent] "I believe you, Dib. I'm sorry I ever doubted you."
translation.zh: “我相信你 迪本 抱歉我怀疑过你”

translation.en: That's the worst Dad impression ever,
translation.zh: 那是对爸爸最糟糕的印象

translation.en: but, Dib, let it go.
translation.zh: 可是迪本 放手吧

translation.en: Zim's been gone a long time,
translation.zh: 邪慕走了很久了

translation.en: and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.zh: 据你所知 他可能一去不回了

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.zh: 我愿意打赌 邪慕再也不会…

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
translation.zh: 等等 他在那

translation.en: [Dib screeches] It's Zim!
translation.zh: 是邪慕！

translation.en: He's back! And he's doing stretches!
translation.zh: 他回来了 他在拉伸！

translation.en: Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.zh: 没人那样拉伸 除非是为做坏事热身

translation.en: This is it! The... [grunts]
translation.zh: 就是现在了 这就是…

translation.en: moment I've been... [grunts and crashes]
translation.zh: 我等待已久的…

translation.en: waiting for!
translation.zh: 时刻

translation.en: [Gaz] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你要干嘛？

translation.en: [groans] Gotta get to Zim!
translation.zh: 一定要抓住… 邪慕

translation.en: Dib, no. Look at you.
translation.zh: 迪本 不要！看看你！

translation.en: The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.zh: 世界还没准备好看到你现在的样子

translation.en: You're hideous!
translation.zh: 你太可怕了

translation.en: The smell!
translation.zh: 这股臭味!

translation.en: needs me!
translation.zh: 需要我

translation.en: -Take a bath first! -[suit alarm blaring]
translation.zh: 先去洗个澡！

translation.en: Take... [gags]
translation.zh: 去洗…

translation.en: Take a bath!
translation.zh: 洗个澡！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕！

translation.en: Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
translation.zh: 对 就是我 而且…

translation.en: -Oh, wait, sorry. -[flies buzzing]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: You'll have to move along, hideous goblin.
translation.zh: 抱歉 给我走开 可怕的丑八怪

translation.en: I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
translation.zh: 我这个夸张姿势是迪本出现时才摆的

translation.en: -I am Dib. -What?
translation.zh: -我是迪本 -什么？

translation.en: -Give me a sec here. -[stammers] We know each other.
translation.zh: -不过… -等我一下 我们互相认识

translation.en: -[thunder claps] -I've been expecting you, Dib!
translation.zh: 我一直在等你 迪本！

translation.en: I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
translation.zh: 我可以看出来 你装了一些洒水装置

translation.en: -[gurgles] -You can't prove anything!
translation.zh: 你什么都证明不了

translation.en: -Anyhow, I-- -Where have you been, Zim?
translation.zh: -反正我… -邪慕 你去哪了？

translation.en: I've been monitoring your house, the school,
translation.zh: 我一直在监视你的房子

translation.en: that taco place you love so much.
translation.zh: 学校 还有你特爱的墨西哥卷饼店

translation.en: No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
translation.zh: 才没有 女孩子爱那个地方 我觉得好脏

translation.en: -[GIR] I ate a baby there. -He did.
translation.zh: -我在那吃了个小孩 -没错

translation.en: What have you been up to, Zim?
translation.zh: 邪慕 你在鼓捣什么？

translation.en: Phase one of my evil plan, human.
translation.zh: 我邪恶计划的第一阶段啊 人类

translation.en: Phase one.
translation.zh: 第一阶段

translation.en: Computer! Laugh with me! [Computer] I don't want to.
translation.zh: -电脑 跟我一起笑 -我不想笑

translation.en: You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.zh: 这段时间你一直在家 坐在厕所里？

translation.en: -Yes. -Like, the whole time?
translation.zh: -是的 -全程都是吗？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Did you have to sit in the toilet?
translation.zh: 你一定要坐在厕所里吗？

translation.en: Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.zh: 迪本 休想摸透我们的行事方式

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.zh: 自从我在这个糟糕的星球 开展任务的那一刻起

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.zh: 自从我在这个糟糕的星球 开展任务的那一刻起 你就阴魂不散 纠缠我每一步行动 像我的史穆斯奎子里的斯夸克

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.zh: 你就阴魂不散 纠缠我每一步行动 像我的史穆斯奎子里的斯夸克

translation.en: -A what in your huh? -Uh-huh!
translation.zh: 你的什么里面的什么？

translation.en: And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
translation.zh: 你的同类很容易忽悠

translation.en: you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
translation.zh: 你却能看穿我绝妙的伪装

translation.en: [stammers] Martha!
translation.zh: 玛莎？

translation.en: -[screeches] Eh? -The neighbor boy's an alien!
translation.zh: 邻居男孩是个外星人

translation.en: [stammers] Never mind, Martha. -He's normal. -Okay.
translation.zh: -没事的 玛莎 他是普通人 -好的

translation.en: I knew if I vanished for long enough, you'd just watch and wait,
translation.zh: 我知道只要消失得够久 你就会观察和等待

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly
translation.zh: 你被忽视的身体就会越来越臭

translation.en: -and useless. -[Dib whimpering]
translation.zh: 变成废物

translation.en: But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
translation.zh: 但那只是我邪恶计划的第一阶段

translation.en: Well, keep watching, Dookie-Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.zh: 继续看着吧 狗屁迪本 就无助地看着我开始

translation.en: Phase Two!
translation.zh: 第二… 阶段吧！

translation.en: I'm switching people's mail around.
translation.zh: -不要！ -我会调换人们的信件

translation.en: That's illegal. No!
translation.zh: 那是违法的 不要！

translation.en: I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我在看别人的报纸 我没付订阅费

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.zh: 没人看报纸了 但不行 不准你看！

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
translation.zh: 小鹿！大骚乱搞起来！

translation.en: That's my mom's pizza sticker.
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈的披萨贴纸

translation.en: She is crazy for pizza.
translation.zh: 她狂迷披萨

translation.en: Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
translation.zh: 嘿 干嘛…你在干嘛…那个…

translation.en: Hey, don't... Wait.
translation.zh: 嘿 不要 等等！

translation.en: Don't! Don't! Don't!
translation.zh: 不要…

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.zh: 优秀

translation.en: Me! Me! Let me do one.
translation.zh: 我！ 我来一个

translation.en: I launched that pug into space.
translation.zh: 我把那条巴哥犬发射到太空了

translation.en: -I thought you liked that pig. -[car alarm goes off]
translation.zh: 我还以为你喜欢那个猪头

translation.en: -Why I do that? -What's the matter, human?
translation.zh: 我干嘛那样做？ 怎么了人类？

translation.en: Why aren't you stopping me?
translation.zh: 你怎么不阻止我？

translation.en: Can't fight back.
translation.zh: 无法还击

translation.en: Sat too long.
translation.zh: 坐了太久

translation.en: Chair fused to butt.
translation.zh: 椅子和屁股粘到一起了

translation.en: More chair than man now.
translation.zh: 都要把人坐成椅子了

translation.en: Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
translation.zh: 人类真是脆弱油腻的东西

translation.en: No Irken would ever become a chair.
translation.zh: 怒星人才不会坐成椅子

translation.en: Wait! Was that Phase Two?
translation.zh: 等等！那是第二阶段吗？

translation.en: Of course it was!
translation.zh: 当然是

translation.en: Probably. Uh... You know what? Now I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 也许吧 这么说吧 我现在也不确定

translation.en: Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair-Dib. So long!
translation.zh: 反正你都无力阻止 椅子迪本 再见！

translation.en: [both] Welcome home, son.
translation.zh: 儿子 欢迎回家

translation.en: Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕！

translation.en: Excellent work, me.
translation.zh: 干得好 我自己！

translation.en: All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.
translation.zh: 一切都照计划进行 但还有很多事要做 小铬

translation.en: Yes, sir! [shouts]
translation.zh: 遵命 长官

translation.en: [shouts] I bloop you, Schmoopsy!
translation.zh: 你中招了 史穆希！

translation.en: [chuckles warmly] Floopsy...
translation.zh: 弗鲁希

translation.en: Computer?
translation.zh: 计算机！

translation.en: [Computer groans] What?
translation.zh: 干嘛？

translation.en: Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest,
translation.zh: 打开和最高陛下的连接

translation.en: my leaders and biggest fans.
translation.zh: 他们我的领导和最大粉丝

translation.en: [Computer] Preparing to call The Tallest. You see, GIR, The Tallest--
translation.zh: -准备呼叫最高陛下 -你瞧 小铬…

translation.en: [Computer] Now calling The Tallest!
translation.zh: 现在呼叫最高陛下！

translation.en: The Tallest haven't heard from me,
translation.zh: 最高陛下很长时间

translation.en: their greatest and most incredible invader,
translation.zh: 没有听到他们最伟大 最不可思议的创新者

translation.en: in a very long time.
translation.zh: 我的消息了

translation.en: -They'll be sick with worry. -[GIR squeaks]
translation.zh: 他们会非常担心的 （最高陛下）

translation.en: Hey, remember Invader Zim?
translation.zh: 嘿！ 记得入侵者邪慕吗？

translation.en: -Who? -Zim. Tiny?
translation.zh: -谁？ -邪慕 那个小个子

translation.en: Screamed a lot?
translation.zh: 经常尖叫

translation.en: The guy that sends us the donuts?
translation.zh: 给咱们送甜甜圈的那个吗？

translation.en: No, that's Invader Jim. He's great.
translation.zh: 不对 那是入侵者吉姆 他很棒

translation.en: Oh, wait. Zim.
translation.zh: 等等！邪慕！

translation.en: -We hate him! -Yeah, that's him. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -我们讨厌他 -嗯 是他

translation.en: Remember the time we lied and told him
translation.zh: 记得那次我们撒谎吗？

translation.en: we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,
translation.zh: 告诉他被派去地球执行秘密任务

translation.en: but really we were just getting rid of him because he's awful?
translation.zh: 但其实只是想摆脱他 因为他这人太烂了

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. We're hilarious.
translation.zh: 记得 我们太搞笑了

translation.en: [comms officer] My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
translation.zh: 最高陛下？ -有一个来电传输 -嗯

translation.en: Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.zh: 邪慕彻底消失后 日子真是挺惬意的

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
translation.zh: 把那则传输接过来吧

translation.en: I wonder who it could ever be. It is I, Zim!
translation.zh: -想知道是谁呢 -是我 邪慕！

translation.en: My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
translation.zh: 最高陛下 你们知道后会大喜过望的 迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划

translation.en: Phase One of my most ingenious plan
translation.zh: 你们知道后会大喜过望的 迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划

translation.en: to prepare Earth for your arrival was a success.
translation.zh: 你们知道后会大喜过望的 迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划 第一阶段已获得圆满成功

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
translation.zh: 邪慕？我们以为你死了

translation.en: Could a dead Zim do this?
translation.zh: 死掉的邪慕可以这样吗？

translation.en: [clears throat] Sirs, my Earthly arch-nemesis is now a sad chair,
translation.zh: 长官 我在地球的主要劲敌 现在是一把悲伤的椅子

translation.en: leaving me free to complete the most diabolical phase of my plan,
translation.zh: 我能在计划中最邪恶的阶段

translation.en: Phase Two,
translation.zh: 即第二阶段大施拳脚

translation.en: wherein I, uh...
translation.zh: 我会…

translation.en: Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.zh: 计算机 让通话待机暂停 不好 我真想不起第二阶段是什么了

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
translation.zh: 不好 我真想不起第二阶段是什么了

translation.en: I must have sat in that toilet too long. Think, Zim. Think.
translation.zh: 我肯定在厕所里蹲了太久 思考啊邪慕 思考

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
translation.zh: 邪慕 我们不在乎！

translation.en: [grunts] Why didn't I write it down?
translation.zh: 我为什么没写下来…等等！

translation.en: Wait! Computer,
translation.zh: 我为什么没写下来…等等！ 计算机？ 回放我讨论第二阶段的任何录像

translation.en: play back any recordings of me discussing Phase Two.
translation.zh: 计算机？ 回放我讨论第二阶段的任何录像

translation.en: [Computer] One recording found.
translation.zh: 找到一段录像

translation.en: Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?
translation.zh: 希望我记录任何 提到第二阶段的内容吗？

translation.en: No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.
translation.zh: 不用 谢谢 邪慕从不健忘

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound,
translation.zh: 除了让我想起 自己形象和声音多么酷之外

translation.en: that was of no help.
translation.zh: 这毫无帮助

translation.en: He knows we can still see and hear him, right?
translation.zh: 他知道我们可以看到和听到他的吧？

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢他死掉的时候

translation.en: [shouts excitedly] I remember Phase Two!
translation.zh: 我记得第二阶段

translation.en: You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 干得好 小铬 告诉我

translation.en: You gonna order a million pizzas,
translation.zh: 你要订购一百万个披萨

translation.en: and then I gotta roll around in them pizzas,
translation.zh: 然后我要在披萨中打滚

translation.en: and that's the story about how I turn into a giant pizza.
translation.zh: 那就是我如何变成巨大披萨的故事

translation.en: This isn't the time for the giant pizza story, GIR.
translation.zh: 这不是讲巨大披萨故事的时候 小铬

translation.en: And that will never happen!
translation.zh: 而且那是不可能的！

translation.en: Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...
translation.zh: 安静！我需要思考 给我冷静

translation.en: Computer, did you put The Tallest on hold?
translation.zh: 计算机？ 你让最高陛下待机暂停了吗？

translation.en: -[Computer] Nope. -[screams]
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I don't think they heard anything. Yes, they did.
translation.zh: -我觉得他们什么都没听到 -不 他们听到了

translation.en: I am Irk's finest Invader.
translation.zh: 我是怒星最优秀的入侵者

translation.en: If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth
translation.zh: 如果最高陛下发现 我因为忘记第二阶段

translation.en: because I forgot Phase Two,
translation.zh: 从而没能统治地球

translation.en: who knows what they'll do?
translation.zh: 天知道他们会做出什么事来

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Red] Invader Zim,
translation.zh: 入侵者邪慕

translation.en: you were once our best, most amazing Invader,
translation.zh: 你曾经是我们最出类拔萃的入侵者

translation.en: but now, you're dumb.
translation.zh: 但现在你既白痴

translation.en: Also, stupid.
translation.zh: 又愚蠢

translation.en: As punishment, you will be stripped of your Invader rank,
translation.zh: 作为惩罚 你要被剥夺入侵者头衔

translation.en: re-encoded as nothing.
translation.zh: 重新编码为废物

translation.en: But you can't! I am Zim!
translation.zh: 但你不可以！我是邪慕

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Red] Control Brains, re-encode.
translation.zh: 控制大脑！重新编码

translation.en: [Control Brains] Re-encoding.
translation.zh: 重新编码进行中

translation.en: It is done, My Tallest.
translation.zh: 完毕 最高陛下

translation.en: Zim, you will live out
translation.zh: 邪慕？ 你接下来漫长悲哀的岁月将会…

translation.en: the rest of your long, sad days as--
translation.zh: 你接下来漫长悲哀的岁月将会…

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Wait, no, never mind.
translation.zh: 等等 不 无所谓了

translation.en: GIR, time is of the essence. -The Tallest could be here any day now... -[gasps]
translation.zh: 小铬 时间至关重要 最高陛下随时会来

translation.en: ...and Dib won't stay a chair forever.
translation.zh: 迪本也不会永远当椅子

translation.en: Go to my scheming lab, and bring me everything that could be Phase Two.
translation.zh: 去我的阴谋实验室 把任何可能是第二阶段的东西拿来

translation.en: -Quickly! -[squeals]
translation.zh: 赶紧！

translation.en: Useless dookie!
translation.zh: 没用的垃圾

translation.en: I need more time to remember Phase Two.
translation.zh: 我需要更多时间来想起第二阶段

translation.en: Computer, how much longer do I have before The Tallest arrive?
translation.zh: 计算机 最高陛下驾到前还有多久？

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Computer] Information unknown. Unacceptable.
translation.zh: -未知信息 -不接受

translation.en: Access The Tallest's computers and retrieve their flight plan.
translation.zh: 进入最高陛下的计算机 检索他们的飞行计划

translation.en: [Computer imitating British accent] Ooh, yes, right away, sir.
translation.zh: 遵命 马上照办 长官

translation.en: [Zim] Are you doing an accent?
translation.zh: 你带上口音了吗？

translation.en: [Computer in normal accent] I get bored.
translation.zh: 我觉得无聊 再说

translation.en: P.S. There is insufficient power to access the flight plan.
translation.zh: 没有足够电力存取飞行计划

translation.en: Then find more power, and be sneaky about it.
translation.zh: 那就多找些电力 要偷偷摸摸地进行

translation.en: [Computer] Activating sneaky mode.
translation.zh: 激活“偷偷摸摸”模式

translation.en: Sneaking!
translation.zh: 偷偷摸摸

translation.en: Sneaking!
translation.zh: 偷偷摸摸

translation.en: Sneaking!
translation.zh: 偷偷摸摸

translation.en: Sneaking!
translation.zh: 偷偷摸摸

translation.en: [Computer] Flight plan retrieved.
translation.zh: 检索到飞行计划

translation.en: [Zim] Along this line is every world the Irken Armada plans to conquer,
translation.zh: 沿着这条线路 是怒星舰队计划征服的所有世界

translation.en: but where's Earth?
translation.zh: 但是地球在哪？

translation.en: The Tallest said it was the most important mission of all.
translation.zh: 最高陛下说这是最重要的使命

translation.en: Computer, zoom out.
translation.zh: 计算机 缩小

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out.
translation.zh: 正在缩小

translation.en: Keep zooming out until you find out how far The Tallest are from Earth.
translation.zh: 继续缩小 直到找出 最高陛下与地球的距离

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out.
translation.zh: 正在缩小

translation.en: Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
translation.zh: 正在缩小

translation.en: -Hurry it up. -Zooming out.
translation.zh: -快点 -正在缩小

translation.en: -Zooming out. -Vámonos!
translation.zh: -快点 -正在缩小 咱们动作快点！

translation.en: I must begin Phase Two
translation.zh: 我必须赶在

translation.en: before Dib gets back into annoying fighting shape.
translation.zh: 迪本恢复烦人的战斗体型之前 开始第二阶段

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
translation.zh: 正在缩小

translation.en: Hmm, I'm sure it's there,
translation.zh: 正在缩小 我确定就在那…

translation.en: -somewhere. -Zooming out.
translation.zh: 在某个地方 正在缩小

translation.en: Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
translation.zh: 正在缩小

translation.en: I was in bad shape, then I got too in shape, now I'm back to normal shape.
translation.zh: 我之前身体很差 然后身体太强 现在恢复正常体型了！

translation.en: Oh, man, Dib, not the coat.
translation.zh: 天啊 迪本 别穿那件外套

translation.en: It makes me look mysterious.
translation.zh: 这让我带着一股神秘感

translation.en: Now, step aside. I've got a Zim to stop.
translation.zh: 现在让开 我要去阻止邪慕

translation.en: All right, test children.
translation.zh: 好了 诸位测试儿童

translation.en: These bracelets are just prototypes,
translation.zh: 这些手环只是原型 所以尽量不要呼吸

translation.en: so try not to breathe or think while the energy field is--
translation.zh: 这些手环只是原型 所以尽量不要呼吸 也不要思考 静静地让能量场…

translation.en: -[Dib grunts] -What? Oh.
translation.zh: 什么？哦！

translation.en: Behold, my boy child!
translation.zh: 瞧我儿子

translation.en: I can't remember the last time I saw you this excited about science.
translation.zh: 我都想不起上次见你 这么为科学激动是什么时候了

translation.en: Huh? My new Peace Day edition Membracelet.
translation.zh: -哈？ -我的新款膜尔手环和平日特别版

translation.en: Tomorrow at my big keynote event, I reveal it to the world.
translation.zh: 明天在我的主题活动中 我会向世界宣告

translation.en: And when Peace Day comes,
translation.zh: 当和平日来临时

translation.en: the children of the Earth will hold hands and...
translation.zh: 地球的孩子会手拉着手…等等

translation.en: The alien-hunting briefcase? Oh, son.
translation.zh: 猎捕外星人公文包？儿子啊

translation.en: Not this nonsense again.
translation.zh: 又开始胡闹了？

translation.en: Dad, trying to save the Earth from Zim's alien evil is not nonsense.
translation.zh: 爸爸 努力拯救地球 免遭外星人邪慕的毒手可不是胡闹

translation.en: Without me, there might not be an Earth to hold hands around.
translation.zh: 要是没有我 可能就没有地球来手牵手了

translation.en: -[children groaning] -Son, there are no aliens.
translation.zh: 儿子 没有外星人

translation.en: I've tried to be patient with your unscientific interests...
translation.zh: 我试着耐心对待 你那毫无科学根据的兴趣

translation.en: -[children shouting] -...bigfeets, ghosts, vampire-bees...
translation.zh: 大脚怪、鬼、吸血鬼蜜蜂

translation.en: You saw those sting marks, and you know I eat a lot of honey now.
translation.zh: 你看到那些刺针印子了！ 你知道我现在吃很多蜂蜜！

translation.en: Well, as a man of science, I need proof, and I just haven't seen--
translation.zh: 作为讲科学的人 我需要证据 但我就是没见到…

translation.en: Proof? Proof?
translation.zh: 证据？

translation.en: How do you need more proof than this?
translation.zh: 你还要多少证据？

translation.en: Everything I've collected from my countless battles with Zim,
translation.zh: 我收集的一切 来自与邪慕不计其数的战斗

translation.en: from my daring travels into the unknown things
translation.zh: 来自我进入未知世界的大胆旅行

translation.en: your science has closed its eyes to.
translation.zh: 这些都是你的科学视而不见的

translation.en: It makes it very difficult to get to the lawnmower.
translation.zh: 走到割草机那好困难噢

translation.en: That's Tak's ship, an alien spaceship
translation.zh: 那是钛克飞船 是我从邪慕的一名外星敌人手上 捕获的外星人飞船！

translation.en: I captured from one of Zim's alien enemies.
translation.zh: 是我从邪慕的一名外星敌人手上 捕获的外星人飞船！

translation.en: Shouldn't spaceships fly?
translation.zh: 飞船不是应该飞的吗？

translation.en: It will, as soon as it lets me fix it.
translation.zh: 它让我修好的话 就能飞了

translation.en: -[metal clangs] -[Tak's ship] Dib, your face is stupid.
translation.zh: 迪本 你的表情好蠢

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] It's a fine, fake spaceship you've built there, son, but--
translation.zh: 儿子 你造了一艘漂亮的假飞船 但是…

translation.en: Fake? It's not...
translation.zh: 假的？才不是

translation.en: Dad, nobody believes me,
translation.zh: 爸 没人相信我

translation.en: so I'm used to defending our world on my own,
translation.zh: 所以我习惯了单打独斗保卫世界

translation.en: but I wish, just once, you'd have my back.
translation.zh: 但我希望这一次 你好歹支持我

translation.en: Wishing isn't very scientific, son.
translation.zh: “希望”不太科学 儿子

translation.en: [Dib] This ends today, Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕 今天作个了断！

translation.en: I'm ready for everything you got!
translation.zh: 你所有本事尽管使出来吧！

translation.en: [announcer on TV] Welcome back once again...
translation.zh: 欢迎再次回到我们的…

translation.en: -Uh... -...countdown to Peace Day...
translation.zh: …和平日倒计时…

translation.en: Intruder! Prepare to come on in!
translation.zh: 闯入者！准备好…请进吧

translation.en: [on TV] I'm Ian Cornish, your host,
translation.zh: 我是主持人 伊恩柏威西

translation.en: on this beautiful, sunny day.
translation.zh: 在这个阳光明媚的好天气

translation.en: And joining us for our countdown to Peace Day
translation.zh: 加入我们“和平日倒计时”的

translation.en: is Bloaty the Pig.
translation.zh: 是肿胀阿猪

translation.en: What do you have for us, Bloaty?
translation.zh: 给我们带来了什么 肿胀仔？

translation.en: Hey, Zim's evil robot. -Where's Zim? -Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: 嘿 邪慕的坏蛋机器人 邪慕在哪？

translation.en: This my special pizza
translation.zh: 这是我的特制披萨

translation.en: I make just for Peace Day.
translation.zh: 专为和平日做的

translation.en: It got ten kinds of pizza inside the pizza,
translation.zh: 在这个披萨里加入了十种披萨

translation.en: so that's pretty good.
translation.zh: 所以非常好吃

translation.en: Where's Zim?
translation.zh: 邪慕在哪？

translation.en: [crying] I don't know! I worry about that boy so much.
translation.zh: 不知道 我好担心那个男孩

translation.en: You want some nachos?
translation.zh: 来点玉米片吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, thank you. Hey, keep it down out here.
translation.zh: -不了谢谢 -嘿 人类？声音小点

translation.en: I'm trying to be miserable in my cheesy cocoon of misery.
translation.zh: 我正试着被紧紧包裹在 悲哀的奶酪之中自怨自艾

translation.en: What's going on in here?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -What's all this junk? -[metallic clattering]
translation.zh: 这些垃圾是干嘛的？

translation.en: Yeah, they're all experiments
translation.zh: 都是实验用的

translation.en: that I was hoping would be Phase Two of my plan.
translation.zh: 希望用在我计划的第二阶段

translation.en: [Dib] Is that supposed to be my dad?
translation.zh: 那应该是我爸吗？

translation.en: Oh, hello, son!
translation.zh: 哈啰 儿子！

translation.en: Yeah. I figured he could replace
translation.zh: 是啊 我以为他能替代你的…

translation.en: your actual dad.
translation.zh: 是啊 我以为他能替代你的… 生父

translation.en: And then, I don't know,
translation.zh: 然后 说不准

translation.en: ground you forever or something.
translation.zh: 可能把你永远禁足之类的吧

translation.en: I just couldn't get it to make pudding the way you love so much.
translation.zh: 我就是没法让他 按照你最喜欢的方式制作布丁

translation.en: -It ruined the illusion! -[bowl clatters]
translation.zh: 幻想破灭了

translation.en: I don't love pudding. What's that smell?
translation.zh: 我不爱吃布丁 那是什么臭味？

translation.en: The smell's all me.
translation.zh: 都是我的臭味

translation.en: What you gonna do about it? [blows raspberry]
translation.zh: 你想怎么样？

translation.en: I'm gonna lock you up, is what!
translation.zh: 我会把你铐起来

translation.en: [groans] Fine, I don't care.
translation.zh: 行吧 无所谓

translation.en: Wait, really? Why?
translation.zh: 等等 真的吗？ 为什么？

translation.en: [Zim] This is the flight path of the Irken Armada.
translation.zh: 这是怒星舰队的飞行路线…

translation.en: And there,
translation.zh: 那里

translation.en: shmillions of light years away from that path
translation.zh: 距离那条路线数百万光年之外

translation.en: is Earth.
translation.zh: 是地球

translation.en: Do you see what this means, human?
translation.zh: 明白这是什么意思吗 人类？

translation.en: That your leaders only fly in a straight line?
translation.zh: 等等 你的领导只飞直线吗？

translation.en: The Tallest aren't coming!
translation.zh: 最高陛下不来了！

translation.en: -So, you really give up? -[whimpering]
translation.zh: 那么你真的放弃了？

translation.en: I actually finally win?
translation.zh: 我最后赢了？

translation.en: Earth is safe.
translation.zh: 地球安全了

translation.en: I've lost the respect of My Tallest!
translation.zh: 我失去了最高陛下的尊重

translation.en: Come on, man.
translation.zh: 别这样 哥们

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] There may come a time when we at Membrane Labs
translation.zh: 可能会有一天… 膜尔实验室的我们 不再让世界更美妙…

translation.en: stop making the world more amazing.
translation.zh: 膜尔实验室的我们 不再让世界更美妙…

translation.en: You know, my dad doesn't respect what I do, either.
translation.zh: 我爸也不尊重我

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] That time is not now.
translation.zh: 但不是现在

translation.en: He thinks I'm crazy like the rest of the world,
translation.zh: 他觉得我和世界上的其他人一样疯狂

translation.en: the world I just saved without anybody knowing.
translation.zh: 我刚才悄悄救下来的这个世界

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Tomorrow, at the Membrane Labs Keynote,
translation.zh: …明天 在膜尔实验室主题活动中

translation.en: we make history again.
translation.zh: 我们会再创历史

translation.en: Membrane Labs. Who wants a better everything?
translation.zh: 膜尔实验室 谁想要更好的一切？

translation.en: -[pig squeals] -Wait a minute, the keynote.
translation.zh: 等等 主题活动

translation.en: Dad's announcing the new Membracelet tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我爸明天要宣布新款膜尔手环

translation.en: The whole world'll be watching.
translation.zh: 全世界都会看

translation.en: If I could somehow take control of Dad's keynote stream,
translation.zh: 如果我能控制爸爸的主题活动数据流

translation.en: I can expose a real alien, you, live in front of the entire planet.
translation.zh: 就能曝光一个真正的外星人 “你当着整个星球的面撒谎了”

translation.en: [as Professor Membrane in strange accent] I believe you, Dib.
translation.zh: 我相信你 迪本

translation.en: I'm sorry I ever doubted you.
translation.zh: 抱歉我怀疑过你

translation.en: Whoo! Yeah, yeah!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: You just might still be good for something, Zim.
translation.zh: 看来你终究还有点用处 邪慕

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 你意下如何？

translation.en: [Zim] Fine. I don't care.
translation.zh: 行吧 无所谓

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们

translation.en: I am so very proud to announce...
translation.zh: 本人非常自豪地宣布…

translation.en: the new Peace Day edition Membracelet!
translation.zh: 新款膜尔手环和平日特别版！

translation.en: Dib,
translation.zh: 迪本？

translation.en: why is Zim here?
translation.zh: 邪慕在这干嘛？

translation.en: Don't worry about it, Gaz.
translation.zh: 别担心 贾斯 就是…

translation.en: It's... I'll explain later.
translation.zh: 别担心 贾斯 就是… 我晚点解释

translation.en: This is Dad's big night.
translation.zh: 今晚是爸爸的重要时刻

translation.en: Don't even think of doing anything dumb, or--
translation.zh: 休想做蠢事

translation.en: Gaz, don't worry. Just go.
translation.zh: -不然… -贾斯 别担心 走吧

translation.en: Enjoy the show.
translation.zh: 享受表演就好

translation.en: I'm sure it's gonna be something special.
translation.zh: 我确定会有点特别

translation.en: Whew. Okay, Zim. Did you use your alien stuff to take over the control room?
translation.zh: 好了 邪慕 你用外星装置 拿下控制室了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Give me a minute.
translation.zh: 好吧 等我一下

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] ...apps such as Peanut Simulator...
translation.zh: …应用程序比如 花生模拟器

translation.en: [Zim] I updated your bracelet.
translation.zh: 我升级了你的手环

translation.en: -[blob squeaks] -Just hit that button, and you'll be in control of everything.
translation.zh: 按下那个按钮 你就能控制一切了

translation.en: Is this update squeaking? -I guess so. -[blob squeaks]
translation.zh: -这个升级在吱吱叫吗？ -我猜是吧

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying it, but this is your greatest work ever.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我会这样说 但这是你干得最好的事情了

translation.en: Eh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: As you know, tomorrow is Peace Day,
translation.zh: 你们知道 明天是和平日

translation.en: and nobody is as excited for the big celebration as I am.
translation.zh: 对于这个大庆典 没人像我一样激动

translation.en: [man] I am! [Professor Membrane] Not scientifically possible!
translation.zh: -我就像！ -科学上不可能！

translation.en: Children. We discovered they generate
translation.zh: 儿童 我们发现他们会生成一种

translation.en: an energy field of limitless, chaotic potential.
translation.zh: 儿童 我们发现他们会生成一种 无限的混乱的潜在能量场

translation.en: We call that child energy "Childergy."
translation.zh: 我们称那种儿童能量为 “熊娃能量

translation.en: The new Membracelet harnesses that childergy
translation.zh: 新款膜尔手环能约束那种熊娃能量

translation.en: and channels it outward as pure peace and joy.
translation.zh: 新款膜尔手环能约束那种熊娃能量 将其导出为纯粹的和平 和喜悦

translation.en: -[all] Ooh. -[Professor Membrane] Tomorrow, -children will hold hands... -[bracelet chirps] ...encircling the planet in Membracelets
translation.zh: 明天 儿童们会戴着膜尔手环 手拉手环绕地球

translation.en: to bring about a peace unlike any -the world has ever known. -[cheers and applause]
translation.zh: 为这个世界带来前所未有的和平

translation.en: Get ready to see the truth, world, but specifically, Dad.
translation.zh: 准备看到真相吧 世界 但确切地说是我爸来看

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 哈？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 完了

translation.en: Greetings, fellow humans.
translation.zh: 问候大家 诸位人类

translation.en: Zim? Wait, what?
translation.zh: 邪慕？ 等等！什么？

translation.en: Where's my dad?
translation.zh: 我爸哪去了？

translation.en: I'm, eh, Professor Zim.
translation.zh: 我是…邪慕教授

translation.en: Oh, so that other guy just retired and put me in charge,
translation.zh: 另外那个家伙退休了 让我负责 我对手环做了一些激动人心的新改动

translation.en: and I just made some exciting new changes to the bracelet.
translation.zh: 让我负责 我对手环做了一些激动人心的新改动

translation.en: -[woman] Eww! -[man] No!
translation.zh: 不要！等等！

translation.en: Wait! Zim's an alien!
translation.zh: 不要！等等！ 邪慕是外星人

translation.en: -[crowd gasps] -[man] No!
translation.zh: -什么？ -不！

translation.en: [in Zim's pre-recorded voice] He's so cool.
translation.zh: 他多么酷

translation.en: We should all do everything he says, no matter how evil it sounds.
translation.zh: 不论听起来多么邪恶 我们应该完全按照他说的做

translation.en: Hail Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕万岁！

translation.en: Yes, be joyous, you fools.
translation.zh: 是的 开心起来 你们这些蠢货

translation.en: Buy my bracelet, and get ready for the most peaceful Peace Day
translation.zh: 买我的手环 做好准备迎接

translation.en: your grotesque eyeballs have ever seen!
translation.zh: 你们怪诞的眼珠子前所未见的 最和平的和平日吧！

translation.en: The bracelet comes in four colors!
translation.zh: 手环有四种颜色

translation.en: [screaming] No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Please say that was just a horrible nightmare.
translation.zh: 请说那只是一个恐怖的噩梦

translation.en: -[Professor Membrane] Son! -Dad?
translation.zh: -儿子！ -爸爸？

translation.en: Breakfast is ready.
translation.zh: 早餐准备好啦

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Yes, yes!
translation.zh: 好棒！

translation.en: Good morning, Da... Oh, no!
translation.zh: 早上好 爸爸…不要！

translation.en: Happy Peace Day, son! You is grounded forever.
translation.zh: 和平日快乐 儿子！ 你被永久禁足了！

translation.en: Bweakfast is da most science-y meal of da day.
translation.zh: 早餐是一天中最科学的一餐

translation.en: Pudding. If Foodio 3000 could just perhaps--
translation.zh: -布丁 -如果厨星3000可以…

translation.en: No, foody guy! I taking care of it.
translation.zh: 不 厨星 我在弄

translation.en: These my kids and science and stuff.
translation.zh: 这是我的孩纸和科学和东西

translation.en: Gaz, I'm so sorry. Zim tricked me.
translation.zh: 贾斯 对不起 邪慕坑了我

translation.en: I didn't mean for any of this to-- What?
translation.zh: -我并非有意让… -什么？

translation.en: You didn't mean to ruin Dad's big show,
translation.zh: 你不是有意毁掉爸爸的盛大活动 让他被绑架

translation.en: get him kidnapped, and hand Zim the keys
translation.zh: 你不是有意毁掉爸爸的盛大活动 让他被绑架 还把膜尔实验室的钥匙交给邪慕 同时害得你和我

translation.en: to Membrane Labs while you and I are held prisoner
translation.zh: 还把膜尔实验室的钥匙交给邪慕 同时害得你和我

translation.en: by something that looks like Dad having an allergic reaction
translation.zh: 被某个看着像爸爸 还对放射性蜜蜂存在过敏反应的家伙

translation.en: to radioactive bees?
translation.zh: 软禁起来？

translation.en: Eh, something the matter, honey?
translation.zh: 有什么事吗 宝贝？

translation.en: Nah, it's cool, Dad.
translation.zh: 没有 没事的 爸爸

translation.en: How can you be so calm? That thing isn't Dad.
translation.zh: 你怎么能如此淡定？ 那个东西不是爸爸

translation.en: Yeah, look. [softly] Just go along with--
translation.zh: 没错 听着 附和它就行了

translation.en: You're not our dad!
translation.zh: 你不是我们的爸爸

translation.en: Oh, man, here we go.
translation.zh: 天啊 这下好了

translation.en: [gasps] That's a terrible thing to say, son.
translation.zh: 儿子 这样说太过分了

translation.en: Oh, Dib, always kidding. Of course, he's our dad.
translation.zh: 迪本老是开玩笑 他当然是我们爸爸

translation.en: Great breakfast, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸爸 早餐很棒

translation.en: -[wailing] -Is it good pudding?
translation.zh: 是好吃的布丁吗？

translation.en: [softly] It's the worst pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.zh: 是我这辈子吃过最难吃的布丁

translation.en: Thanks, honey.
translation.zh: 谢谢 宝贝

translation.en: It's not easy taking care of two kids on my own...
translation.zh: 独自抚养两个孩子不容易 不过…

translation.en: [grunts] It's so rewarding.
translation.zh: 独自抚养两个孩子不容易 不过… 很有成就感

translation.en: You're a clone.
translation.zh: 你是个克隆体

translation.en: Our real dad's been kidnapped by Zim.
translation.zh: 我们真正的爸爸被邪慕绑架了

translation.en: Son, it not nice to say bad things about your best friend.
translation.zh: 儿子！说你挚友的坏话可不好！

translation.en: Zim is not my best friend.
translation.zh: 邪慕不是我的挚友

translation.en: -He's wonderful. -No, he's the worst.
translation.zh: 他很棒 不 他是最烂的

translation.en: -You love Zim? -No!
translation.zh: -你爱邪慕吗？ -不 我恨他…

translation.en: I hate him! He's the most--
translation.zh: -你爱邪慕吗？ -不 我恨他… -他是最… -我爱邪慕

translation.en: I love Zim.
translation.zh: -他是最… -我爱邪慕

translation.en: [whispers] We need to get out of here. And find Dad, but Clembrane's fast.
translation.zh: -我们要离开这 -并且找到爸爸 但克隆膜尔动作很快

translation.en: -Clembrane? -Clone, membrane.
translation.zh: -克隆膜尔？ -克隆加上膜尔

translation.en: And yeah, I already tried busting out every possible way.
translation.zh: -克隆膜尔？ -克隆加上膜尔 我已经试过各种出逃办法了 都不行

translation.en: No luck.
translation.zh: 我已经试过各种出逃办法了 都不行

translation.en: You tried escaping without me?
translation.zh: 你试图丢下我自己跑？

translation.en: Let's focus on the now, Dib.
translation.zh: 咱们要专注眼下 迪本

translation.en: Every move I made, he was there to stop me.
translation.zh: 不管我有什么举动 他都能阻止我

translation.en: Remember, kids,
translation.zh: 孩子们记住 我始终陪在你们身边

translation.en: I'm here for you if you ever need to talk about stuff...
translation.zh: 孩子们记住 我始终陪在你们身边 如果你们需要谈论什么…

translation.en: Stay in school. Brush your teeth.
translation.zh: 待在学校 刷好牙

translation.en: That's good advice, Dad.
translation.zh: 那是好建议 爸爸

translation.en: -[music plays on TV] -Ooh, it's time for Peace Day now!
translation.zh: 是时候享受和平日了

translation.en: [announcer] If you're just tuning in to our Peace Day coverage...
translation.zh: 如果把频道换我们和平日的报道

translation.en: ...you're watching Zim, the new head of Membrane Labs,
translation.zh: 你就正在观看 膜尔实验室的新领导 邪慕

translation.en: personally overseeing the sale of his new Membracelet
translation.zh: 正从全球部署的最新 移动膜尔实验室商店之一

translation.en: from one of the new mobile M-Labs Stores deployed all around the world.
translation.zh: 亲自监督新款膜尔手环的销售

translation.en: Yeah! [laughs] -Yeah! -[bird squawks]
translation.zh: （膜尔实验室店员说 踩踏人数“正常”）

translation.en: So, this show is just Zim laughing the whole time?
translation.zh: 那么 这个节目就是邪慕全程大笑？

translation.en: [announcer] And that concludes the laughing portion of the program.
translation.zh: 这句话结束了节目的大笑环节

translation.en: People of Earth, of which I am one,
translation.zh: 地球上的人类啊 我也是其中一员 因为我是人类

translation.en: because I am human and inferior and disgusting
translation.zh: 我也是其中一员 因为我是人类 并且我和你们一样低劣恶心

translation.en: just like you are, Happy Peace Day!
translation.zh: 并且我和你们一样低劣恶心 祝你们和平日快乐

translation.en: My amazing new Peace Day Bracelet is a huge success!
translation.zh: 我优秀的新款和平日手环大获成功

translation.en: You, barely sentient bag of meat and juice,
translation.zh: 你 愚蠢无知的行尸走肉

translation.en: what do you think of my new bracelet?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的新款手环怎么样？

translation.en: I love it!
translation.zh: 我喜欢！

translation.en: It's a lot more alive than I expected, though.
translation.zh: 尽管比我想象得更生动

translation.en: [chuckles] It sure is.
translation.zh: 那当然

translation.en: Already, children around the world are beginning to hold hands.
translation.zh: 全世界的儿童已经开始手拉手

translation.en: Soon, the ring of children will connect right here,
translation.zh: 很快 儿童之环就会在这里相连

translation.en: and my greatest plan shall be revealed!
translation.zh: 我最伟大的计划即将揭晓

translation.en: [announcer] He really does seem to love his job.
translation.zh: 他看起来真的很爱这份工作

translation.en: Wait a minute. That place looks familiar.
translation.zh: 等一下 那个地方看着眼熟

translation.en: Is that...
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕！

translation.en: Get off my lawn!
translation.zh: 离开我家草坪！

translation.en: Hi, Dib!
translation.zh: 嗨 迪本！

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这干嘛？

translation.en: I live here!
translation.zh: 我住在这

translation.en: You're gonna have to speak up!
translation.zh: 你得大声点！

translation.en: You won't get away with this!
translation.zh: 你不会有好下场的！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -You won't get a-- -What?
translation.zh: -你不会有好下场… -什么？

translation.en: -You won't get awa-- -What?
translation.zh: -你不会有好下场… -什么？

translation.en: -You won't get away-- -What?
translation.zh: -你不会有好下场… -什么？

translation.en: -You-- -What?
translation.zh: -你… -什么？

translation.en: Dib, check out how huge your head looks on TV.
translation.zh: 迪本 看看你脑袋在电视上有多大

translation.en: I'm here for you, buddy. Come here.
translation.zh: 我来了 孩子 过来

translation.en: [Zim] Work harder, children.
translation.zh: 再努力点 孩子们

translation.en: -Harder! -[children grunting]
translation.zh: 继续努力

translation.en: [Zim] Don't you want world peace?
translation.zh: 你们不想要世界和平了吗？

translation.en: Work harder for Zim.
translation.zh: 给邪慕再加把劲

translation.en: -[laughs maniacally] -[angry meowing]
translation.zh: （邻家小猫痛恨和平 儿童伤心）

translation.en: [laughing] Hi, Dib.
translation.zh: 嗨 迪本

translation.en: Look at them, GIR.
translation.zh: 瞧他们啊 小铬

translation.en: All this time trying to subjugate the humans,
translation.zh: 我长久以来都试图征服人类

translation.en: and all I had to do was charge them for it.
translation.zh: 原来只用收他们的钱就行了

translation.en: But the children of Earth are letting me down.
translation.zh: （圆环完整度）

translation.en: I need you to use the power of your Irken robot brain
translation.zh: 我需要你使用怒星机器人大脑的能量

translation.en: to create a song about peace.
translation.zh: 为和平创作一首歌曲

translation.en: One so inspiring, the children will have no choice but to peace harder!
translation.zh: 要非常鼓舞人心 让儿童别无选择 只能更努力地制造和平

translation.en: Like this?
translation.zh: 像这样吗？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm? -No, GIR.
translation.zh: 不对 小铬

translation.en: -[gasps] -Try again.
translation.zh: 再想想

translation.en: I think I know.
translation.zh: 有主意了

translation.en: Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
translation.zh: 和平好 和平赞

translation.en: ♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice! ♪
translation.zh: 和平绝对能胜过鸡肉饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪ ♪ Nice, nice, nice ♪
translation.zh: 和平、和平、和平 好评、好评、好评

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace Chicken, chicken ♪ ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: 和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
translation.zh: 和平好 和平赞

translation.en: ♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice! ♪
translation.zh: 和平绝对能胜过鸡肉饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪
translation.zh: 和平、和平、和平 好评、好评、好评

translation.en: [all] ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: 和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
translation.zh: 和平好 和平赞

translation.en: ♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice ♪
translation.zh: 和平绝对能胜过鸡肉饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪ -[siren chirps] -[meows sadly]
translation.zh: 和平、和平、和平 好评、好评、好评

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace Chicken, chicken ♪ ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: 和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace is nice... ♪
translation.zh: 和平好…

translation.en: [Zim] It's working!
translation.zh: 有效果了

translation.en: It's working!
translation.zh: 有效果了！

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: Zim's done something to the bracelets!
translation.zh: 邪慕对手环做了手脚

translation.en: Don't hold hands!
translation.zh: 别拉手

translation.en: Relax. It's Zim we're talking about.
translation.zh: 放松吧 咱们说的可是邪慕啊 不管他计划了什么

translation.en: Whatever he's got planned, it's not gonna work.
translation.zh: 咱们说的可是邪慕啊 不管他计划了什么 都不可能奏效的

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Ha! Nothing happened, Zim!
translation.zh: 什么事都没发生 邪慕

translation.en: Of course nothing happened, human.
translation.zh: 当然没有事情发生啦 人类

translation.en: It's not enough to simply attach a space-phasing alien horror blob
translation.zh: 单给这些手环加上 太空相变外星恐怖粘团

translation.en: to these bracelets.
translation.zh: 是不够的

translation.en: "Space phasing"?
translation.zh: “太空相变”？

translation.en: You'd also need something with the power to harness the dark energy of space
translation.zh: 还需要可以约束太空暗能量的动力

translation.en: to activate them.
translation.zh: 才能激活它们

translation.en: Only one being in the known universe has such a power.
translation.zh: 整个宇宙中只有一个东西有这种动力

translation.en: My creation, Minimoose.
translation.zh: 我的杰作 小鹿

translation.en: [men chanting] ♪ Minimoose ♪
translation.zh: 小鹿

translation.en: Behold my victory!
translation.zh: 看着我的成功吧！

translation.en: Look at me being wrong. What have you done, Zim?
translation.zh: -我居然判断错了 -你做了什么 邪慕？

translation.en: I've teleported the Earth to a part of space
translation.zh: 我… 把地球直接传送到怒星舰队路径中了

translation.en: directly in the path of the Irken Armada.
translation.zh: 把地球直接传送到怒星舰队路径中了

translation.en: Now The Tallest have to visit me next.
translation.zh: 现在最高陛下的下一站必须来拜访我

translation.en: -Where's our dad? -You what?
translation.zh: -我们爸爸在哪？ -你们什么？

translation.en: I can't believe I fell for your sad, shmoopy act!
translation.zh: 不敢相信我居然会同情你的悲伤伎俩

translation.en: My shmoop was no act.
translation.zh: 我的悲伤可不是装出来的

translation.en: I truly felt I had failed The Tallest,
translation.zh: 我真心觉得让最高陛下失望了

translation.en: but then you told me about the power of the bracelet,
translation.zh: 但你告诉我手环的能量之后

translation.en: inspiring me. It's funny, really. -Laughter, GIR. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 我受到启发 真的很有趣 小铬快笑

translation.en: And I owe it all to--
translation.zh: 多亏了你们

translation.en: I smell pudding.
translation.zh: 我闻到布丁的味道了

translation.en: ...to you!
translation.zh: 多亏了你！

translation.en: Is that part of your brilliant plan, Zim?
translation.zh: 那是你精妙计划的一部分吗 邪慕？

translation.en: Eh, probably.
translation.zh: 可能吧

translation.en: I mean, I'm so incredible, even I don't know everything I do.
translation.zh: 我太出色了 有时候我都不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Computer, what is that thing in space that just happened?
translation.zh: 计算机 太空中刚才出现的是什么东西？

translation.en: [Computer] Thing is a Florpus Hole
translation.zh: 这“东西”是非常愚蠢地传送整个星球

translation.en: created by the incredibly stupid teleportation of an entire planet.
translation.zh: 这“东西”是非常愚蠢地传送整个星球 所产生的黑洞

translation.en: And is "Florpus Hole" as cool as it sounds?
translation.zh: 黑洞酷如其名吗？

translation.en: [Computer] Florpus Hole will suck in all nearby worlds,
translation.zh: 黑洞会吞噬附近的天体

translation.en: wherein they will collide violently with alternate realities.
translation.zh: 它们会在异世界中暴力碰撞

translation.en: There, you see? It's just a shmorpus hole.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？就是个黑洞罢了

translation.en: Besides, The Tallest'll get here long before there's any trouble.
translation.zh: 再说 出问题之前最高陛下早就到了

translation.en: Zim, that Florpus is gonna destroy the Earth, you included!
translation.zh: 邪慕 黑洞会摧毁地球 包括你在内

translation.en: If you're so worried about the Florpus, just get your dad to help.
translation.zh: 要是这么担心黑洞 就去找你爸啊

translation.en: I'm over here, everybody.
translation.zh: 诸位 我在这里

translation.en: He's only a shmillion light years away
translation.zh: 他就在数百万光年之外的烤肉10号

translation.en: on Moo-Ping 10, also known as
translation.zh: 他就在数百万光年之外的烤肉10号 亦称太空监狱！

translation.en: Space Prison!
translation.zh: 亦称太空监狱！

translation.en: Why don't you hop in your spaceship and go rescue him?
translation.zh: 不妨跳进你们的宇宙飞船去救他？

translation.en: Oh, wait, you don't have a spaceship!
translation.zh: 等等 你们没有宇宙飞船！

translation.en: [clears throat] Lawrence! Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got some Tall company on the way.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯！ 现在告辞 最高陛下们要来了！

translation.en: Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕！

translation.en: [comms officer] My Tallest?
translation.zh: 最高陛下！

translation.en: Something appears to have appeared in our path.
translation.zh: 似乎有某种东西… 出现在我们的路线中

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 是什么？

translation.en: A terrifying, deadly space anomaly.
translation.zh: 一种恐怖致命的空间异常！

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm, mmm-hmm, interesting. -Mmm, yeah, okay.
translation.zh: -有意思 -好吧

translation.en: As well as the planet Earth.
translation.zh: 以及地球

translation.en: Earth? That means Zim! This is the worst news I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 地球？那意味着邪慕！ 这是我听到过的最糟糕的消息

translation.en: Sirs, we still have quite a bit of time to change course.
translation.zh: 长官们 咱们还有一点时间来改道

translation.en: But we're going straight. Yeah. Turning's no fun.
translation.zh: -但我们要走直线 -是的 转弯不好玩

translation.en: Why is this happening? Make it not happen.
translation.zh: 为什么会出这种事？让它别发生

translation.en: It's been ten years, Gaz.
translation.zh: 十年了 贾斯

translation.en: Ten long years trapped in this house with the pudding monster.
translation.zh: 在这栋屋子里被布丁怪物困了十年

translation.en: It's been two days, but yeah.
translation.zh: 是两年

translation.en: How come you kids don't play with the science puppy I made for you?
translation.zh: 你们俩干嘛不玩 我给你们做的科学小狗？

translation.en: -[Dib] Because it's pudding. -[dog barks] I hate this as much as you do,
translation.zh: -因为那是布丁 -我也跟你一样痛恨这些

translation.en: but it's not like anyone can just walk out the front door.
translation.zh: 但谁也没法走出大门

translation.en: Okay, it's not like we can just walk out the front door,
translation.zh: 好吧 咱们没法走出大门

translation.en: but maybe we can... Hmm.
translation.zh: 但也许我们可以…

translation.en: Hey, Dad.
translation.zh: 嘿 爸爸？

translation.en: Stop calling him "Dad!"
translation.zh: 别叫他爸爸了！

translation.en: [narrator] Now, pay close attention to that ham,
translation.zh: 现在密切注意那根火腿

translation.en: 'cause it's not the last time you're gonna see that ham in the story.
translation.zh: 因为这不是在这个故事中 最后一次见到那个火腿

translation.en: -[muffled grunting] -Dad, you and Dib need more father-son time together.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你和迪本需要一些父子时间

translation.en: Just look at him. He's all messed up, needs more quality time with you.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧他 他一团糟 需要和你过一些品质时光

translation.en: Ooh, I see what you mean. You got any suggestions?
translation.zh: 我了解你的意思 你有什么建议吗？

translation.en: This was a good idea, honey.
translation.zh: 这是个好主意 亲爱的

translation.en: Science projects bring families together. How can I help you, son?
translation.zh: 科学计划能让家庭更团结 有何可以效劳的 儿子？

translation.en: You need me to put some science pudding on it?
translation.zh: 你需要我把科学布丁弄上去吗？

translation.en: Uh, maybe later.
translation.zh: 晚点吧

translation.en: You just keep stirring, uh, Dad.
translation.zh: 你继续搅拌就好 爸爸

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Festering human, you have stolen me away from my rightful owner!
translation.zh: 糜烂的人类！ 你把我从合法主人手中偷走！

translation.en: Look, ship, I get that you don't like me and all, but we need your help.
translation.zh: 听着 飞船 我明白你不喜欢我 但我们需要你的帮助

translation.en: [Tak's ship] I don't help anyone but Tak.
translation.zh: 我谁也不帮 进攻！

translation.en: See? It's no use.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？没用

translation.en: -You hate Dib, right? -Affirmative.
translation.zh: 你讨厌迪本 对吧？ 确认

translation.en: But you hate Zim even more. Correct.
translation.zh: -但你更讨厌邪慕？ -正确

translation.en: I see where you're going with this.
translation.zh: 我知道你在做什么了

translation.en: Helping us break our dad out of Moopington would--
translation.zh: 帮我们将爸爸救出烤肉镇就可以…

translation.en: Wait, do you mean Moo-Ping 10?
translation.zh: 等等！你是说烤肉10号？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: It would make Zim super unhappy.
translation.zh: 这会让邪慕超级不爽

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Flawless logic. I will help you.
translation.zh: 逻辑无懈可击 我会帮你们的

translation.en: [both] Yes!
translation.zh: -很好 -有一个条件

translation.en: -[Tak's ship] On one condition. -What's that?
translation.zh: -很好 -有一个条件 是什么？

translation.en: Disconnect my seat sensors so I don't feel your terrible human butts in me.
translation.zh: 断开我的座位感应器 我就觉察不到 体内有你们糟糕的人类屁股了

translation.en: Deal.
translation.zh: 成交！

translation.en: We did it, kids. Hurray for science.
translation.zh: 成功了 孩子们 为科学喝彩！

translation.en: Right. Now, about that pudding...
translation.zh: 没错 关于那个布丁…

translation.en: Don't wait up for us, Clembrane!
translation.zh: 不用等我们了 克隆膜尔！

translation.en: [both] Yeah!
-[Florpus Hole crackling] -[Tak's ship] Oh. You guys have a deadly Florpus Hole now.
translation.zh: 你们现在有个致命黑洞

translation.en: -That's new. -[Dib] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这可是新消息 -快点 飞船

translation.en: -Let's hurry, ship. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.zh: -这可是新消息 -快点 飞船 少对我颐指气使 不过好的

translation.en: But okay.
translation.zh: 少对我颐指气使 不过好的

translation.en: Now, this is what I like to see, GIR.
translation.zh: （喜迎身膏陛下）

translation.en: Pathetic humans fleeing in terror at the sight of Zim!
translation.zh: 可悲的人类在邪慕眼前惊恐逃窜！

translation.en: [GIR] Nobody even looking at you.
translation.zh: 甚至没人看你！

translation.en: -[car alarm goes off] -It's a show of respect.
translation.zh: 那是表示尊敬

translation.en: Their stupid eyes can't handle all this.
translation.zh: 他们愚蠢的眼睛接受不了这些！

translation.en: Anyhow, terrible work on the signs, GIR,
translation.zh: 话说回来 这些标志做得很糟 小铬

translation.en: worse than I expected.
translation.zh: 比我想象得更糟糕

translation.en: Aww, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Did you build me that throne I asked for?
translation.zh: 我要的王座给我造好了吗？

translation.en: [Zim] Excellent.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Now, to ascend this throne,
translation.zh: 现在要爬上王座

translation.en: and claim my rightful place as...
translation.zh: 宣布我的合法地位…

translation.en: Hah! But where are the flames?
translation.zh: 但火焰在哪？ 身后不喷射酷炫火焰的话

translation.en: I can't rule the world without cool flames shooting up behind me.
translation.zh: 但火焰在哪？ 身后不喷射酷炫火焰的话 我就没法统治世界

translation.en: Hit the flames button!
translation.zh: 按火焰按钮

translation.en: Wait, are those peanuts?
translation.zh: 等等 那些是花生吗？

translation.en: [GIR] Oops.
translation.zh: 哎呀！

translation.en: Try the peanuts button.
translation.zh: -试试花生按钮 -好吧

translation.en: [Zim] All right, flames, uh, peanuts,
translation.zh: -试试花生按钮 -好吧 火焰？花生？

translation.en: flames, uh, peanuts?
translation.zh: 火焰？花生？

translation.en: [screams] The peanuts! [laughing] Oh, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 花生！

translation.en: The Tallest will be so happy!
translation.zh: 最高陛下会好高兴的！

translation.en: [The Tallest moaning] We're so unhappy!
translation.zh: 我们非常不高兴

translation.en: Zim's so close, I can almost smell him.
translation.zh: 邪慕好近了 我都能闻到他的气味

translation.en: [comms office] Sirs, really, it's no big deal.
translation.zh: 长官 真的没什么大不了

translation.en: We can just steer around the--
translation.zh: -我们可以转弯… -等等

translation.en: Wait, why steer around the Earth when we can just blow it up?
translation.zh: 明明可以炸掉地球 干嘛绕道？

translation.en: Yeah, we're great at blowing stuff up. -[alert blips] -What is that?
translation.zh: 对 我们最擅长炸东西了 那是什么？

translation.en: -[comms officer] It appears to be a-- -Blow it up!
translation.zh: -这似乎是一个… -炸掉它！

translation.en: [comms office] But, sirs, there's still the life-destroying space hole to consider.
translation.zh: 但是长官 还要考虑 摧毁生命的太空黑洞

translation.en: Man, this guy.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个家伙

translation.en: [mockingly] "I fly the spaceship, and I sure love steering!"
translation.zh: “我在开飞船 我爱转弯”

translation.en: [mockingly] "Ooh, look at me steering all over the place.
translation.zh: 是啊“瞧我到处转弯

translation.en: Look at me steering with my wittle steering hands."
translation.zh: 瞧我用小手转弯”

translation.en: I like that we're funny.
translation.zh: 我喜欢咱们搞笑的样子

translation.en: -[music stops] -[both] Hey!
translation.zh: （顶卡比丽普布鲁普世奎普…）

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Your noises are bad. Also, we're here.
translation.zh: -嘿！ -你们的噪音很难听 （监狱）

translation.en: Moo-Ping 10,
translation.zh: 烤肉10号

translation.en: prison to the galaxy's most infamous criminals.
translation.zh: 监禁星系中最臭名昭著罪犯的地方

translation.en: Okay, their defenses are about to go down.
translation.zh: 好吧 防御准备解除

translation.en: How do you know?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Just get ready.
translation.zh: 准备好就行

translation.en: All right, now what?
translation.zh: 好吧 现在怎么办？

translation.en: [Tak's ship] I'll go cause a diversion and come back when you've found your dog.
translation.zh: 我去吸引注意力 你们找到狗了我再回来

translation.en: -Our dad. -Whatever.
translation.zh: 是我们的爸爸 随便啦

translation.en: That's our diversion. You ready?
translation.zh: 他们被引开了 准备好了吗？

translation.en: I was born ready, Gaz. This spy coat isn't just to look cool.
translation.zh: 我天生就准备好了 贾斯 这件侦探外套可不只是好看而已

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Dib] Now we'll never find Dad!
translation.zh: 现在我们再也找不到爸爸了

translation.en: normally, you crying on the floor is hilarious, but come on.
translation.zh: 你在地上哭通常很好笑 但是别气馁

translation.en: It's all my fault, Gaz. [groans]
translation.zh: 都是我的错 贾斯

translation.en: Why aren't you saying I told you so?
translation.zh: 你干嘛不说“我早告诉你了”？

translation.en: 'Cause making fun of you is no fun when you're this sad.
translation.zh: 因为你这么伤心的时候 取笑你并不好玩

translation.en: You're my brother, man.
translation.zh: 你毕竟是我兄弟

translation.en: I only torment you because I know you can handle it.
translation.zh: 我只在知道你能应付的时候 才欺负你

translation.en: I've done way worse than throwing you in a space prison.
translation.zh: 我做的事情比 把你丢进太空监狱糟糕多了

translation.en: This is nothing. Get up!
translation.zh: 这不算什么 起来

translation.en: I was supposed to save the world, Gaz, not help Zim destroy it.
translation.zh: 贾斯 我应该拯救世界的 而不是帮助邪慕摧毁它

translation.en: I was gonna show people the truth.
translation.zh: 我本来要给人们看到真相

translation.en: I knew if they saw something amazing,
translation.zh: 我知道若他们看到一些不可思议的事

translation.en: even if it was horrible, like Zim, people would just wake up,
translation.zh: 即便是很糟糕的事情 比如邪慕 人们就会醒悟

translation.en: and stop obsessing over all the little things
translation.zh: 不再痴迷那些鸡毛蒜皮

translation.en: and see that there was something bigger out there,
translation.zh: 而会纵观全局

translation.en: something to unite against.
translation.zh: 会团结起来

translation.en: Instead of fighting each other, the world would know there was--
translation.zh: 而不是彼此争斗 世界就会知道…

translation.en: [Gaz] Hey, Dib! Shut up and look!
translation.zh: 迪本 闭嘴 看啊！

translation.en: -Dad! -[Professor Membrane] Son!
translation.zh: 爸爸！ 儿子！

translation.en: -[aliens] Aww! -[Professor Membrane] I didn't want to interrupt your lovely, imaginary speech.
translation.zh: 我不想打断你动人又有想象力的演讲

translation.en: Imaginary?
translation.zh: 有想象力？

translation.en: Well, the last thing I remember was something hitting me on the head
translation.zh: 我最后只记得有东西击中我的头

translation.en: and starting this incredible hallucination.
translation.zh: 然后开始产生这种令人不可思的幻想

translation.en: No, this is all really happening.
translation.zh: 不 这是真实发生的

translation.en: Zim used your bracelets to teleport the Earth
translation.zh: 邪慕利用你的手环 将地球传送到宇宙的另一个地方

translation.en: to another part of the universe!
translation.zh: 将地球传送到宇宙的另一个地方

translation.en: Do you know how?
translation.zh: 你知道怎么做到的吗？

translation.en: [alien] Uh, he's not gonna know how.
translation.zh: 他不会知道的

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, the Membracelet is just for running apps
translation.zh: 儿子 膜尔手环只能 跑程序和促进世界和平

translation.en: and world peace, but, oh, theoretically...
translation.zh: 儿子 膜尔手环只能 跑程序和促进世界和平 不过理论上人们可以用它来 比如

translation.en: -[aliens gasp] -...one could use it to, say,
translation.zh: 不过理论上人们可以用它来 比如

translation.en: create a galactic star gate of sorts, yes.
translation.zh: 创建各种星系之门 是的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: That's crazy, yo.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了！

translation.en: Well, we knew it was possible,
translation.zh: 我们知道这个可能性

translation.en: but only with the addition of a purely theoretical
translation.zh: 但除非加上一团纯属理论上的

translation.en: alien horror blob energized by a purely theoretical
translation.zh: 外星恐怖粘团 再由纯属理论上的 紫色太空小鹿来激活

translation.en: -tiny purple space moose. -[aliens chuckling]
translation.zh: 再由纯属理论上的 紫色太空小鹿来激活

translation.en: But all those things don't exist, so we didn't worry about it.
translation.zh: 但这些东西都不存在 所以我们不曾担心

translation.en: Minimoose!
translation.zh: 小鹿

translation.en: Dad, if you had that purple space moose, could you use it to teleport the Earth
translation.zh: 爸 如果你有那只紫色太空小鹿 能把地球传送回

translation.en: back where it belongs?
translation.zh: 之前的位置吗？

translation.en: Theoretically, mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 理论上可以

translation.en: Too bad we're in prison.
translation.zh: 可惜我们在监狱里

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Three human butts is too many, so I brought this.
translation.zh: 三个人类屁股太可怕了 所以我带了这个

translation.en: Hop in.
translation.zh: 跳进来吧

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] This is all so real!
translation.zh: -这一切都太真实了 -不是幻觉

translation.en: -Not a hallucination. -[Gaz] Shotgun!
translation.zh: -这一切都太真实了 -不是幻觉 我要坐前排

translation.en: -[aliens cheering] -[alien] See you later!
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: Only enough room in there for you guys, I guess.
translation.zh: 看来空间只能容纳你们

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Hang on to your disgusting butts!
translation.zh: 恶心的屁股坐稳了！

translation.en: What's with you and butts?
translation.zh: 你对屁股有什么成见？

translation.en: [laughs maniacally] Okay, okay. Okay, enough running and screaming. Let's mix it up a bit.
translation.zh: 好了！跑够了叫够了 咱们混合一下！

translation.en: Maybe bow down before me or something.
translation.zh: 不妨在我面前叩拜什么的

translation.en: Hmm, leaping is good.
translation.zh: 跳跃也挺好

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Well, that was very convincing.
translation.zh: 那个非常有说服力

translation.en: Because it's real, Dad!
translation.zh: 因为这是真的 爸爸

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] How could anything that horrifying be real?
translation.zh: 那么恐怖的东西怎么可能是真的？

translation.en: Dad, the Earth's minutes away from being destroyed!
translation.zh: 爸爸 地球几分钟就会被毁灭了

translation.en: Why are you laughing?
translation.zh: 你干嘛还在笑？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Minimoose is a funny name.
translation.zh: 小鹿是个很有趣的名字

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Normally, I'd say "Don't touch me," but maybe a little help?
translation.zh: 通常我会说别碰我 但你能帮个忙吗？

translation.en: -[alarms blaring] -[Tak's ship] This isn't good.
translation.zh: 情况不妙

translation.en: Gaz!
translation.zh: 贾斯！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Marvelous!
translation.zh: 非常棒！

translation.en: I truly believe I'm falling to a hideous death!
translation.zh: 我真的相信我会进入恐怖的死亡

translation.en: Hang on, Dad!
translation.zh: 抓稳 爸爸！

translation.en: Don't let go!
translation.zh: 别放手

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Don't worry. None of this is real.
translation.zh: 别担心 这都不是真的

translation.en: -I'll prove everything to you. -[cat meows]
translation.zh: 我会向你证明一切

translation.en: Just hang on!
translation.zh: 抓稳就好

translation.en: You'll be proud of me!
translation.zh: 你会以我为荣的！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, you don't have to prove anything.
translation.zh: 儿子 你什么都不用证明

translation.en: I'm always proud of you.
translation.zh: 我一直以你为荣

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: [Zim] I did it, GIR.
translation.zh: 我做到了 小铬

translation.en: The humans cower in fear before my superior Irken might,
translation.zh: 人类在我强大的怒星上级面前 恐惧臣服

translation.en: and just in time.
translation.zh: 来得正是时候

translation.en: Is that The Tallest I see approa--
translation.zh: 我看到的是不是最高陛下…

translation.en: Dib?
translation.zh: 迪本？

translation.en: You...
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: Give me the moose.
translation.zh: 把鹿给我

translation.en: Zim, that moose is the only thing
translation.zh: 邪慕！ 只有那只鹿可以拯救地球 不被你的黑洞毁灭

translation.en: that can save Earth from your Florpus!
translation.zh: 只有那只鹿可以拯救地球 不被你的黑洞毁灭

translation.en: [grunts] Get your own moose, human! -This one's mine! -[squeaks]
translation.zh: 你自己去抓只鹿啊 人类！ 这只是我的！

translation.en: Hah, I think you're cool too, Minimoose.
translation.zh: 哈！我觉得你也很酷 小鹿！

translation.en: [Dib] Stop! We're running out of time!
translation.zh: 站住！我们没时间了！

translation.en: [Zim] You're ugly when you lie, Dib!
translation.zh: 你撒谎的时候很丑 迪本

translation.en: [Dib] I'm not lying! [Zim] Then why are you ugly?
translation.zh: -我没撒谎 -那你为什么这么丑？

translation.en: -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No!
translation.zh: -把鹿给我！ -不给！

translation.en: [Zim] I liked you better when you were a chair!
translation.zh: 我更喜欢你是椅子的样子

translation.en: And I liked you better when you were a toilet!
translation.zh: 我更喜欢你是厕所的样子

translation.en: I was not a toilet!
translation.zh: 我不是厕所！

translation.en: [Dib grunting] Leprechaun cat, no--
translation.zh: 猫妖 不好！

translation.en: I was hiding in the toilet.
translation.zh: 我是藏在厕所里

translation.en: Zim!
translation.zh: 邪慕！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Well, he's dead.
translation.zh: 他死了 小铬呢？

translation.en: GIR, all this evil is doing a number on my throat.
translation.zh: 这些恶行让我嗓子痛

translation.en: Fetch me a soothing lozenge!
translation.zh: 给我拿点喉宝来

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Why are you wearing those shirts?
translation.zh: 你们干嘛穿那些衣服？

translation.en: I never hired any of you!
translation.zh: 我从未雇佣过你们！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Don't worry, son.
translation.zh: 别担心 儿子

translation.en: I've got your back.
translation.zh: 我支持你

translation.en: Spencer! Devon!
translation.zh: 史宾塞！戴文！

translation.en: -Maria! -[Professor Membrane] Come on!
translation.zh: 玛丽亚！

translation.en: Lawrence!
translation.zh: 劳伦斯！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: GIR, avenge your robot brothers and Maria.
translation.zh: 小铬！为你的兄弟们复仇！ 以及玛丽亚

translation.en: Yes, my master!
translation.zh: 遵命 主人

translation.en: You're terrible, GIR!
translation.zh: 你太烂了 小铬

translation.en: It's over, Zim.
translation.zh: 结束了 邪慕

translation.en: -[sips] -Oh, it is?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, now I'm sad. Wait! Have you forgotten?
translation.zh: 现在我伤心了 等等！忘了他了吗？

translation.en: You're grounded!
translation.zh: 你被禁足了！

translation.en: -And you, get away from my son! -[choking]
translation.zh: 还有你 离我儿子远点！

translation.en: -[babbles] -...what's happening? -[babbles] -What is this thing?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？那是什么东西？

translation.en: -He's you, Dad. -[Professor Membrane] What?
translation.zh: 他是你 爸爸 -什么？ -谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？

translation.en: Who's me, son? I'm me.
translation.zh: -什么？ -谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？

translation.en: But who's that? Pudding break.
translation.zh: -什么？ -谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？ 布丁休息时间

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm very confused right now.
translation.zh: 我现在很困惑

translation.en: [Zim] So, it has been revealed.
translation.zh: 被发现了

translation.en: You've discovered the clone is not actually
translation.zh: 你发现这个克隆人不是你

translation.en: your real father!
translation.zh: 真正的爸爸了！

translation.en: You told me he wasn't my real father.
translation.zh: 你告诉过我他不是我真正的爸爸

translation.en: Pudding break over. [Professor Membrane] Oh, this feels so real!
translation.zh: -布丁休息时间结束 -哦！这种感觉好真实！

translation.en: -We need that moose, Dad! -[crashes in distance]
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们需要那只鹿！

translation.en: [laughs] Nothing's uglier than moose jealousy, Dib.
translation.zh: 没什么比为了鹿争风吃醋更丑陋了 迪本 搞什么…

translation.en: Ooh, what the... Where did--
translation.zh: 没什么比为了鹿争风吃醋更丑陋了 迪本 搞什么… 到底在哪…

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Yours is the worst... [glitching] butt of them... butt of them all, Zim.
translation.zh: 你的屁股是最烂的 邪慕

translation.en: Dib!
translation.zh: 迪本！

translation.en: Do you still have that ham I gave you?
translation.zh: 我给你的火腿还留着吗？

translation.en: Of course!
translation.zh: 那当然

translation.en: The ham!
translation.zh: 火腿！

translation.en: [narrator] See? There's that ham again.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？ 火腿又出现了

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Great work, honey, but...
translation.zh: 干得好 宝贝 不过…

translation.en: Oops.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: Honey, fighting doodn't solve anything.
translation.zh: 宝贝？ 打架解决不了问题！

translation.en: Also, I found this little moose thing. Look at it. Isn't it funny?
translation.zh: 我还找到这只小鹿 看啊！可爱吧？

translation.en: I command you to return the moose
translation.zh: 我命令你把鹿拿过来

translation.en: and destroy the Membrane family!
translation.zh: 然后摧毁膜尔一家

translation.en: But... they my family.
translation.zh: 但是… 他们是我的家人

translation.en: And that guy, it's like looking into a mirror.
translation.zh: 而且那个人 跟我就像照镜子

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Oh, I don't know about-- [grunts angrily] I should've known you'd fail me!
translation.zh: -我不知道… -我就该知道你会让我失望的

translation.en: You couldn't even learn to make pudding the right way.
translation.zh: 你连怎么做布丁都学不会

translation.en: Hey! You leave Clembrane alone!
translation.zh: 嘿 你别欺负克隆膜尔

translation.en: Yeah! [in British accent] It's the best pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.zh: 没错 那是我吃过的最好的布丁

translation.en: Excellent. Now, just...
translation.zh: 非常好 现在就…

translation.en: -No! -[squeals]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [gasps] It's happening!
translation.zh: 正在发生！

translation.en: Use the moose!
translation.zh: 用这只鹿！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Uh, right. Use the moose.
translation.zh: 好吧 用这只鹿

translation.en: Um, okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Everyone, hold hands again.
translation.zh: 大家再次手拉手！

translation.en: [Gaz in normal accent] Yeah! Your lives depend on it!
translation.zh: 你们活命就全靠它了！

translation.en: Okay! Hold my hand.
translation.zh: 好的 握住我的手！

translation.en: No way! Be serious!
translation.zh: 休想！认真点 现在大家加油

translation.en: Now, come on, everyone. Faster!
translation.zh: 休想！认真点 现在大家加油 快点！

translation.en: I did my best.
translation.zh: 我尽力了

translation.en: It's no use, Dib.
translation.zh: 没用的 迪本

translation.en: You've lost. The Irken Armada is already here.
translation.zh: 你输了 怒星舰队已经到了

translation.en: Forward cannons now at full power.
translation.zh: 前加农炮开足火力！

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Almost have it.
translation.zh: 就快好了

translation.en: Dad, hurry!
translation.zh: 爸爸 快点！

translation.en: We're entering the Florpus!
translation.zh: 我们要进入黑洞了！

translation.en: [Zim] Zim has won!
translation.zh: 邪慕赢了！

translation.en: No pressure, Dad,
translation.zh: 不要有压力 爸爸 但是…

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Cut me some slack! This is my first moose!
translation.zh: 别这么严格 这是我的第一只鹿！

translation.en: Relax. [in distorted voice] It's just realities colliding like my computer said.
translation.zh: 放松 就像我计算机说的 这只是现实碰撞而已

translation.en: [in distorted voice] And tearing Earth apart, you moron!
translation.zh: 而且会把地球撕裂的 你这个蠢货！

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, no.
translation.zh: 好了 不好

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I've got it!
translation.zh: 好了！

translation.en: My Tallest, the Earth...
translation.zh: 最高陛下？ 地球呢？它不见了

translation.en: It's gone.
translation.zh: 地球呢？它不见了

translation.en: That's great news.
translation.zh: 真是好消息

translation.en: -Crisis averted. -Hurray!
translation.zh: 避开危机了 万岁！现在我们不用转弯了

translation.en: Now we don't have to turn.
translation.zh: 万岁！现在我们不用转弯了

translation.en: [comms officer] Sirs, there's still the horrifying space hole straight ahead.
translation.zh: 长官 正前方还有恐怖的太空黑洞

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Purple] Why are you so negative?
translation.zh: 你这人怎么这么消极？

translation.en: [The Tallest] Yay! Whoo-hoo!
-[Almighty Tallest Purple] Yeah-- -[electricity buzzes]
[Professor Membrane] Now, prepare your eating faces
translation.zh: 现在 露出大块朵颐的表情…

translation.en: for incalculable nutrition!
translation.zh: 享受无法估算的丰富营养吧！

translation.en: Good work, Foodio.
translation.zh: 干得好 厨星

translation.en: Thank you, Gazlene.
translation.zh: 谢谢 贾斯林

translation.en: I hope you can taste the love simulation I made it with.
translation.zh: 希望你们能尝出我做饭时的模拟爱

translation.en: -[heavy footsteps approach] -[Clembrane] Just one final ingwedient.
translation.zh: 再加最后一份食材

translation.en: [laughs] Family and pudding and science and wobots and stuff.
translation.zh: 家人、布丁、科学和机器人！

translation.en: -So, does he live here now or what? -[Gaz grunts]
translation.zh: 他现在是住这了还是怎么的？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm still very confused. -[laughs] -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -我还是很困惑 -嗯

translation.en: Enjoying your losers' meal, eh, Dib?
translation.zh: 失败者的食物好吃吗 迪本？

translation.en: "Losers"? Your plan failed.
translation.zh: 失败者？你的计划失败了

translation.en: Did it, Dib? Did it?
translation.zh: 是吗 迪本？失败了吗？

translation.en: What if I told you my plan all along
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你 我的计划

translation.en: was to steal this whatever-it-is?
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你 我的计划 一直是偷走这个 管它是什么！

translation.en: Phase Two. It was Phase Two all along.
translation.zh: 第二阶段 第二阶段一直就是这个

translation.en: Is that the ceramic clown puppy from our living room?
translation.zh: 那是我们起居室的陶瓷小丑狗吗？

translation.en: Who's laughing now, Dib?
translation.zh: 现在谁在笑啊 迪本？

translation.en: I am, see? [laughing]
translation.zh: 是我 看到了吗？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Why didn't you invite your little green friend in for dinner, son?
translation.zh: 儿子 干嘛不邀请 你的小绿朋友来吃饭呢？

translation.en: Dad, that was Zim, the alien who almost destroyed the world, remember?
translation.zh: 爸！那是邪慕 差点毁灭世界的外星人 记得吗？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, of course I remember.
translation.zh: 儿子 我当然记得

translation.en: I remember getting hit on the head and dreaming up all that crazy stuff.
translation.zh: 我记得脑子被打了 而且梦见那些很疯狂的东西

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: What's happening? Is everything over?
translation.zh: -怎么啦？一切结束了吗？ -是的 小铬

translation.en: Yes, GIR, I'm just waiting for The Tallest
translation.zh: -怎么啦？一切结束了吗？ -是的 小铬 我正在等最高陛下接这通电话

translation.en: to answer this call so I can tell them all about my success.
translation.zh: 我正在等最高陛下接这通电话 我就能告诉他们我的胜利

translation.en: Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
translation.zh: 咱们赢了吗？

translation.en: Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
translation.zh: 咱们赢了吗？

translation.en: -[inhales] -[screams] Did we win?
translation.zh: 咱们赢了吗？

translation.en: Of course. Zim always wins...
translation.zh: 那当然！邪慕总是赢

translation.en: No thanks to you working with the enemy.
translation.zh: 没有赢啦 因为你勾结敌人

translation.en: -[Minimoose squeaks] -Heh, good one, Minimoose. -I can't stay mad at you. -[screen buzzes]
translation.zh: 干得好 小鹿 我没法一直生你的气

translation.en: Ah, here we go.
translation.zh: 来了

translation.en: My Tallest, I am pleased to report
translation.zh: 最高陛下 我很高兴地汇报 我的计划大获成功

translation.en: my plan was a success and I now have Dib's puppy clown thing,
translation.zh: 最高陛下 我很高兴地汇报 我的计划大获成功 现在迪本的小丑狗在我手上了

translation.en: which was my plan all along.
translation.zh: 这一直就是我的计划

translation.en: Does this please you?
translation.zh: 二位开心吗？

translation.en: That sounded like a yes to me.
translation.zh: 我听起来像是肯定

translation.en: Yay! I missed you so much!
translation.zh: 耶！我好想你
